lines.text: I didn't kill that man, Henry.
I know you didn't, but you're involved in it, and I'd like to put the cuffs on yuh.
Listen, give me 48 hours, and I'll clear up the whole matter for you.
I wouldn't give you 48 minutes. If I had my gun for 48 seconds, I'd turn you in.

[after he's shot "The Boss"]
Shall I call an ambulance?

[as "The Boss' to his gang]
I've decided he looks a little too much like me to have us both around at the same time.
